name: The Lightning Hunter
description: The Lightning Hunter is a 2D platformer with 2 different environmental areas within a single level. The goal of the game is to keep moving forward (towards the right side) until they reach the end which will complete the game. Throughout the journey, the player will come across different types of skeleton enemies that they can take down by shooting lightning out of their eyes. Plus, traps that they can’t destroy and will have to avoid.  This game is a prototype that shows 1 level of what the game will be like in the future.
